page.title: 19THE MEOLE ESTATE
page.content: The{Meole Estate}is a big coucil house estate. It is situated east of{Meole {Village}beyond the{Rea Brook.}In the estate is the{Maesbrook Centre}with a Spar shop, a combined butchers and greengrocers and a post office. Above the shops are flats. Nearby live old people in semi-detatched bungalows. {Mrs Taylor}said that she was happy there being close to the shops and her family and it being a quiet place. At the northern end of the estate are three blocks of flats, the highest is five storeys. Most of the estate is made up of terraced houses mainly with six houses to a terrace. Along{Mary {Webb}Road is a Community Centre being used today for polling in the local elections. Inside are polling booths, the presiding officer and polling clerk surrounded by a music centre, a pool table and fruit gaming machines.
